20. Mention any outstanding differences in the preparation of meals in the earliest days as compared with today.

In the early days, we didn't have the prepared foods like those of today. Cake mix, pie crust mix, bisquick, as well as many canned meat ready for use have simplified today's shopping & meal preparations.
